Back to Index

Stem

These are the measurements of the stem.

Length

This is length of the stem extension from the head tube.

Angle

This is the angle of the extension from the head tube. Perpendicular to the head tube is considered zero degrees.

Rise

This is height of the base of the stem to the centerline of the extension.

Spacer

This is height of any installed spacers.

Headset

This is height of the headset.
